Description of incident: An FTC complaint states that a LabMD spreadsheet with insurance billing data of over 9,000 customers was discovered on a public file sharing network. Social Security numbers, insurance information, medical treatment codes, and dates of birth were exposed by the cyber security issue.  Identity thieves were found to have acquired the personal information of at least 500 LabMD customers.UPDATE (11/15/2013): LabMD disputed the FTC probe and alleged that the government funded the breach to retaliate against LabMD.
